data.title: Alex Sulpizio on LinkedIn: A Growing Pattern of Broader Applicability: Nebraska Enacts a…
data.meta_description: Benjamin Mishkin and Daniel Kilburn of Cozen O'Connor discuss the new Nebraska Data Privacy Law, which marks the sixteenth entry into the national patchwork of…
data.text:
Is your business adapting to the many new privacy laws being enacted? In our latest Alert, my colleagues and I explore what’s to come in 2024’s complex consumer and data privacy law landscape. https://lnkd.in/er6xdM4R #DataPrivacy #PrivacyLaw

The data privacy landscape in the U.S. is rapidly evolving. Every year for the last two years, around 4 or 5 new privacy laws come online or begin enforcement! To give you a hand, we've created a State Privacy Law tracker that breaks down some of the most important components of each comprehensive state privacy law. Check it out, and bookmark this space! We'll be updating it as new laws come out (and as current laws are updated): https://pvcy.me/3v2JUhl #DataPrivacyLaws #StatePrivacyLaws #PrivacyCompliance

Maryland recently became the fifth state in 2024—and the 17th U.S. state overall—to pass a comprehensive data privacy law. In this alert, Phil Yannella, Sharon Klein, Timothy Dickens, and Jason Hirsch review the law, explaining the unique provisions that increase operational and legal risk for U.S. businesses and institutions. #dataprivacylaw #dataprivacy #Maryland

Stay ahead in 2024 with key insights on state privacy law compliance deadlines. Thanks to David Stauss and the team at Husch Blackwell for this comprehensive overview, which is essential for businesses navigating the evolving landscape of consumer data privacy laws. https://lnkd.in/epw3erhv #PrivacyLaw #Compliance #DataPrivacy
